mapper.insert: MERGE into cart_ck using dual on (product_code = #{proCode}) when matched then update set cart_volume = cart_volume + #{cartVolume} when not matched then insert (cart_no,cart_volume,user_id,product_code) values (cart_seq.nextval,#{cartVolume},#{userId},#{proCode})
mapper.select: select A.hugi_no, A.hugi_content, A.hugi_date, A.user_id, A.product_code, A.op_no, B.user_name, C.product_name, C.company from member_ck B join hugi_ck A on B.user_id = A.user_id join products_ck C on A.product_code = C.product_code where A.product_code = #{proCode} order by A.hugi_no desc
